description: pyTickets are light-weight symmetrically signed data containers with optional encryption, serialiation and compression of their contents. Now includes an alpha DiffieHellman implementation. Do not trust it yet -)

info.Keywords:: ticket tickets encrypt secure sign signed ignature hash hashed

longdescription: pyTickets are light-weight symmetrically signed data containers with optional encryption, serialiation and compression of their contents. Now includes an alpha DiffieHellman implementation. Do not trust it yet -)
